This directory contains stuff I manually downloaded:

Godot_v3.4.4-stable_mono_export_templates.zip
* downloaded from https://downloads.tuxfamily.org/godotengine/3.4.4/mono/Godot_v3.4.4-stable_mono_export_templates.tpz
  - linked from https://godotengine.org/download/server
* removed stuff that is not needed to build HTML5 and re-zipped

Godot_v3.4.4-stable_mono_linux_headless_64.zip
* downloaded from https://downloads.tuxfamily.org/godotengine/3.4.4/mono/Godot_v3.4.4-stable_mono_linux_headless_64.zip
  - linked from https://godotengine.org/download/server
